segments.text: Are you feeling OK ? You sound a little tired this morning .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I did not sleep much last night . I really feel bad . It was a crazy night .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I had a bad dream . I was walking alone in the graveyard , and suddenly all the ghosts jumped out of their graves . They began to chase me through the graveyard and shouted that they wanted my blood .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , what a nightmare ! Then what happened ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My mother woke me up . She had heard me crying out for help .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You have got a great mother .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I felt embarrased . After all , I am 18 years old . Mom gave me some chocolate cookies and a glass of milk .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , but i was afraid to fall back asleep . I am worrying about getting into the University of Michigan .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Me too . But I tell myself that if they don â€™ t accept me , another school will .
segments.speaker: S1
